DOC.brief_title: Coronary Artery Disease ( CAD ) Women Marathon Runners
DOC.detailed_description: Single-center , non-randomized , prospective , observational study . The study population 100 female athlete competitive long distance runner , minimum 10 year . Multi-slice compute tomography ( MSCT ) use characterize amount , severity type atherosclerotic lesion . MSCTA perform per usual practice use minimum X-ray dose protocol . The study determine whether moderate high intensity , long term athletic training competition associate enhance coronary artery disease woman . Each participant complete life-style , training volume risk factor questionnaire . These participant compare age , gender risk factor match cohort .
